verses.verse: בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> The sons יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah פֶּ֧רֶץ <S%H6557><s%> Pharez חֶצְר֛וֹן <S%H2696><s%> Hezron וְכַרְמִ֖י <S%H3756><s%> and Carmi וְח֥וּר <S%H2354><s%> and Hur וְשׁוֹבָֽל׃ <S%H7732><s%> and Shobal

וּרְאָיָ֤ה <S%H7211><s%> And Reaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שׁוֹבָל֙ <S%H7732><s%> of Shobal הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יַ֔חַת <S%H3189><s%> Jahath וְיַ֣חַת <S%H3189><s%> and Jahath הֹלִ֔יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחוּמַ֖י <S%H267><s%> Ahumai וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לָ֑הַד <S%H3855><s%> and Lahad אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These מִשְׁפְּח֥וֹת <S%H4940><s%> These [are] the families הַצָּֽרְעָתִֽי׃ <S%H6882><s%> of the Zorathites ס

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> These אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> And these [were of] the father עֵיטָ֔ם <S%H5862><s%> of Etam יִזְרְעֶ֥אל <S%H3157><s%> Jezreel וְיִשְׁמָ֖א <S%H3457><s%> and Ishma וְיִדְבָּ֑שׁ <S%H3031><s%> and Idbash וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> and the name אֲחוֹתָ֖ם <S%H269><s%> of their sister הַצְלֶלְפּֽוֹנִי׃ <S%H6753><s%> [was] Hazelelponi

וּפְנוּאֵל֙ <S%H6439><s%> And Penuel אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> the father גְדֹ֔ר <S%H1446><s%> of Gedor וְעֵ֖זֶר <S%H5829><s%> and Ezer אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> the father חוּשָׁ֑ה <S%H2364><s%> of Hushah אֵ֤לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> These [are] the sons חוּר֙ <S%H2354><s%> of Hur בְּכ֣וֹר <S%H1060><s%> the firstborn אֶפְרָ֔תָה <S%H672><s%> of Ephratah אֲבִ֖י <S%H1><s%> the father בֵּ֥ית לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H1035><s%> of Bethlehem

וּלְאַשְׁחוּר֙ <S%H806><s%> And Ashur אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> the father תְק֔וֹעַ <S%H8620><s%> of Tekoa הָי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> had שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> had two נָשִׁ֑ים <S%H802><s%> wives חֶלְאָ֖ה <S%H2458><s%> Helah וְנַעֲרָֽה׃ <S%H5292><s%> and Naarah

וַתֵּ֨לֶד <S%H3205><s%> bare ל֤וֹ נַעֲרָה֙ <S%H5292><s%> And Naarah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחֻזָּ֣ם <S%H275><s%> him Ahuzam וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֵ֔פֶר <S%H2660><s%> and Hepher וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תֵּימְנִ֖י <S%H8488><s%> and Temeni וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֲחַשְׁתָּרִ֑י <S%H326><s%> and Haahashtari אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> These [were] the sons נַעֲרָֽה׃ <S%H5292><s%> of Naarah
וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons חֶלְאָ֑ה <S%H2458><s%> of Helah צֶ֥רֶת <S%H6889><s%> [were] Zereth [יִצְחָר כ] (וְצֹ֖חַר <S%H3328><s%> Jitschar ק) וְאֶתְנָֽן׃ <S%H869><s%> and Ethnan

וְק֣וֹץ <S%H6976><s%> And Coz הוֹלִ֔יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עָנ֖וּב <S%H6036><s%> Anub וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצֹּבֵבָ֑ה <S%H6637><s%> and Zobebah וּמִשְׁפְּח֥וֹת <S%H4940><s%> and the families אֲחַרְחֵ֖ל <S%H316><s%> of Aharhel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son הָרֽוּם׃ <S%H2037><s%> of Harum

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become יַעְבֵּ֔ץ <S%H3258><s%> And Jabez נִכְבָּ֖ד <S%H3513><s%> was more honourable מֵאֶחָ֑יו <S%H251><s%> than his brethren וְאִמּ֗וֹ <S%H517><s%> and his mother קָרְאָ֨ה <S%H7121><s%> called שְׁמ֤וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name יַעְבֵּץ֙ <S%H3258><s%> Jabez לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Because יָלַ֖דְתִּי <S%H3205><s%> Because I bare בְּעֹֽצֶב׃ <S%H6090><s%> him with sorrow

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> called יַ֠עְבֵּץ <S%H3258><s%> And Jabez לֵאלֹהֵ֨י <S%H430><s%> on the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Oh that בָּרֵ֨ךְ <S%H1288><s%> thou wouldest bless תְּבָרֲכֵ֜נִי <S%H1288><s%> me indeed וְהִרְבִּ֤יתָ <S%H7235><s%> and enlarge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גְּבוּלִי֙ <S%H1366><s%> my coast וְהָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become יָדְךָ֙ <S%H3027><s%> and that thine hand עִמִּ֔י <S%H5973><s%> would וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> might be with me and that thou wouldest keep מֵּרָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> [me] from evil לְבִלְתִּ֣י <S%H1115><s%> that may not עָצְבִּ֑י <S%H6087><s%> that it may not grieve וַיָּבֵ֥א <S%H935><s%> granted אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> me And God אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what שָׁאָֽל׃ <S%H7592><s%> him that which he requested

וּכְל֥וּב <S%H3620><s%> And Chelub אֲחִֽי־ <S%H251><s%> the brother שׁוּחָ֖ה <S%H7746><s%> of Shuah הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְחִ֑יר <S%H4243><s%> Mehir ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> who אֲבִ֥י <S%H1><s%> which [was] the father אֶשְׁתּֽוֹן׃ <S%H850><s%> of Eshton

וְאֶשְׁתּ֗וֹן <S%H850><s%> And Eshton הוֹלִ֞יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֤ית רָפָא֙ <S%H1051><s%> Bethrapha וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּסֵ֔חַ <S%H6454><s%> and Paseah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תְּחִנָּ֖ה <S%H8468><s%> and Tehinnah אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> the father עִ֣יר נָחָ֑שׁ <S%H5904><s%> of Irnahash אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> are the men רֵכָֽה׃ <S%H7397><s%> of Rechah ס

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons קְנַ֔ז <S%H7073><s%> of Kenaz עָתְנִיאֵ֖ל <S%H6274><s%> Othniel וּשְׂרָיָ֑ה <S%H8304><s%> and Seraiah וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> and the sons עָתְנִיאֵ֖ל <S%H6274><s%> of Othniel חֲתַֽת׃ <S%H2867><s%> Hathath

וּמְעוֹנֹתַ֖י <S%H4587><s%> And Meonothai הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עָפְרָ֑ה <S%H6084><s%> Ophrah וּשְׂרָיָ֗ה <S%H8304><s%> and Seraiah הוֹלִ֤יד <S%H3205><s%> begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹאָב֙ <S%H3097><s%> Joab אֲבִי֙ <S%H1><s%> the father גֵּ֣יא <S%H1516><s%> of the valley חֲרָשִׁ֔ים <S%H2798><s%> of Charashim כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for חֲרָשִׁ֖ים <S%H2796><s%> were craftsmen הָיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> become פ

וּבְנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> And the sons כָּלֵ֣ב <S%H3612><s%> of Caleb בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְפֻנֶּ֔ה <S%H3312><s%> of Jephunneh עִ֥ירוּ <S%H5900><s%> Iru אֵלָ֖ה <S%H425><s%> Elah וָנָ֑עַם <S%H5277><s%> and Naam וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> and the sons אֵלָ֖ה <S%H425><s%> of Elah וּקְנַֽז׃ <S%H7073><s%> even Kenaz

וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons יְהַלֶּלְאֵ֑ל <S%H3094><s%> of Jehaleleel זִ֣יף <S%H2128><s%> Ziph וְזִיפָ֔ה <S%H2129><s%> and Ziphah תִּירְיָ֖א <S%H8493><s%> Tiria וַאֲשַׂרְאֵֽל׃ <S%H840><s%> and Asareel

וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> And the sons עֶזְרָ֔ה <S%H5834><s%> of Ezra יֶ֥תֶר <S%H3500><s%> [were] Jether וּמֶ֖רֶד <S%H4778><s%> and Mered וְעֵ֣פֶר <S%H6081><s%> and Epher וְיָל֑וֹן <S%H3210><s%> and Jalon וַתַּ֙הַר֙ <S%H2029><s%> and she bare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִרְיָ֣ם <S%H4813><s%> Miriam וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׁמַּ֔י <S%H8060><s%> and Shammai וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׁבָּ֖ח <S%H3431><s%> and Ishbah אֲבִ֥י <S%H1><s%> the father אֶשְׁתְּמֹֽעַ׃ <S%H851><s%> of Eshtemoa

וְאִשְׁתּ֣וֹ <S%H802><s%> And his wife הַיְהֻדִיָּ֗ה <S%H3057><s%> Jehudijah יָלְדָ֞ה <S%H3205><s%> bare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יֶ֨רֶד <S%H3382><s%> Jered אֲבִ֤י <S%H1><s%> the father גְדוֹר֙ <S%H1446><s%> of Gedor וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֶ֙בֶר֙ <S%H2268><s%> and Heber אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> the father שׂוֹכ֔וֹ <S%H7755><s%> of Socho וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְקֽוּתִיאֵ֖ל <S%H3354><s%> and Jekuthiel אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> the father זָנ֑וֹחַ <S%H2182><s%> of Zanoah וְאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> another בְּנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> And these [are] the sons בִּתְיָ֣ה <S%H1332><s%> of Bithiah בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after לָקַ֖ח <S%H3947><s%> took מָֽרֶד׃ <S%H4778><s%> which Mered ס

וּבְנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> And the sons אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> of [his] wife הֽוֹדִיָּ֔ה <S%H1940><s%> Hodiah אֲח֣וֹת <S%H269><s%> the sister נַ֔חַם <S%H5163><s%> of Naham אֲבִ֥י <S%H1><s%> the father קְעִילָ֖ה <S%H7084><s%> of Keilah הַגַּרְמִ֑י <S%H1636><s%> the Garmite וְאֶשְׁתְּמֹ֖עַ <S%H851><s%> and Eshtemoa הַמַּעֲכָתִֽי׃ <S%H4602><s%> the Maachathite

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons שִׁימ֔וֹן <S%H7889><s%> of Shimon אַמְנ֣וֹן <S%H550><s%> [were] Amnon וְרִנָּ֔ה <S%H7441><s%> and Rinnah בֶּן־ חָנָ֖ן <S%H1135><s%> Benhanan [וְתֹולֹון כ] (וְתִילֹ֑ון <S%H8436><s%> birth ק) וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons יִשְׁעִ֔י <S%H3469><s%> of Ishi זוֹחֵ֖ת <S%H2105><s%> [were] Zoheth וּבֶן־ זוֹחֵֽת׃ <S%H1132><s%> and Benzoheth

בְּנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> The sons שֵׁלָ֣ה <S%H7956><s%> of Shelah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah עֵ֚ר <S%H6147><s%> [were] Er אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> the father לֵכָ֔ה <S%H3922><s%> of Lecah וְלַעְדָּ֖ה <S%H3935><s%> and Laadah אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> the father מָרֵשָׁ֑ה <S%H4762><s%> of Mareshah וּמִשְׁפְּח֛וֹת <S%H4940><s%> and the families בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house עֲבֹדַ֥ת <S%H5656><s%> of them that wrought הַבֻּ֖ץ <S%H948><s%> fine linen לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house אַשְׁבֵּֽעַ׃ <S%H791><s%> of Ashbea

וְיוֹקִ֞ים <S%H3137><s%> And Jokim וְאַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H582><s%> and the men כֹזֵבָ֗א <S%H3578><s%> of Chozeba וְיוֹאָ֧שׁ <S%H3101><s%> and Joash וְשָׂרָ֛ף <S%H8315><s%> and Saraph אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בָּעֲל֥וּ <S%H1166><s%> who had the dominion לְמוֹאָ֖ב <S%H4124><s%> in Moab וְיָשֻׁ֣בִי לָ֑חֶם <S%H3433><s%> and Jashubilehem וְהַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> things עַתִּיקִֽים׃ <S%H6267><s%> And [these are] ancient

הֵ֚מָּה <S%H1992><s%> These הַיּ֣וֹצְרִ֔ים <S%H3335><s%> These [were] the potters וְיֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> and those that dwelt נְטָעִ֖ים <S%H5196><s%> among plants וּגְדֵרָ֑ה <S%H1449><s%> Gederah עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> with the king בִּמְלַאכְתּ֖וֹ <S%H4399><s%> for his work יָ֥שְׁבוּ <S%H3427><s%> there they dwelt שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there ס

בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> The sons שִׁמְע֑וֹן <S%H8095><s%> of Simeon נְמוּאֵ֣ל <S%H5241><s%> [were] Nemuel וְיָמִ֔ין <S%H3226><s%> and Jamin יָרִ֖יב <S%H3402><s%> Jarib זֶ֥רַח <S%H2226><s%> Zerah שָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> [and] Shaul
שַׁלֻּ֥ם <S%H7967><s%> Shallum בְּנ֛וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son מִבְשָׂ֥ם <S%H4017><s%> Mibsam בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son מִשְׁמָ֥ע <S%H4927><s%> Mishma בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son

וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons מִשְׁמָ֑ע <S%H4927><s%> of Mishma חַמּוּאֵ֥ל <S%H2536><s%> Hamuel בְּנ֛וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son זַכּ֥וּר <S%H2139><s%> Zacchur בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son שִׁמְעִ֥י <S%H8096><s%> Shimei בְנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son

וּלְשִׁמְעִ֞י <S%H8096><s%> And Shimei בָּנִ֨ים <S%H1121><s%> sons שִׁשָּׁ֤ה <S%H8337><s%> and six עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> teen וּבָנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> daughters שֵׁ֔שׁ <S%H8337><s%> and six וּלְאֶחָ֕יו <S%H251><s%> but his brethren אֵ֖ין <S%H369><s%> have בָּנִ֣ים <S%H1121><s%> children רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> had not many וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all מִשְׁפַּחְתָּ֔ם <S%H4940><s%> neither did all their family לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor הִרְבּ֖וּ <S%H7235><s%> multiply עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> like בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> like to the children יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah ס
וַיֵּֽשְׁב֛וּ <S%H3427><s%> And they dwelt בִּבְאֵֽר־ שֶׁ֥בַע <S%H884><s%> at Beersheba וּמוֹלָדָ֖ה <S%H4137><s%> and Moladah וַחֲצַ֥ר שׁוּעָֽל׃ <S%H2705><s%> and Hazarshual
